Posts.Content: Mar 31, 2007 06:45AM karenmidland wrote: thanks anne--i just want this to be over with and have my llife back--lot's of ladies seem to get through radiation without much difficulty so can only hope for the best--wish i was as gutsy as some of you--i can hardly sleep anymore-the stress is getting to me and i hate being such a weakling--reading about everyone else sure helps and doesn,t make me feel so alone--i too though abourt just not doing the radiation and taking my chances--then i look at the statistics and realize there is no "behind door #3"--just mastectomy or lumpectomy with radiation-so here i go april 9th like it or not
